title: The event..
body: I completed all the missions. Do i get anymore?

replies.body:
I'm at 26 tokens with the only quests available as Rift only.

I only play ARAM, so I guess this event is pointless for me as 26 doesn't get me anything.

Two key fragments?

You can complete them all in bot games if that helps you at all *shrug*

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=EvPBGAPX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-02-12T12:41:30.976+0000)
>
> Two key fragments?
> 
> You can complete them all in bot games if that helps you at all *shrug*

They say "matchmade games only" though.
Matchmade games includes bot games (you're still matchmade with your team), just not customs or training modes. It'll specify PvP matchmade if it can't be completed in co-op vs AI :)
nope u can only have more token by buying em in shops with RP. 96 token is max for events
